extendedInfo.description: Do you wish to surprise the one you love in Valentine's Day? You can send them some of the love quotes in this app, and let them know how much you love them. Very romantic quotes, directly to melt your lover heart.But not only for special ocassions like Valentine's day. Use this app all other days of the year and make your loved feel special.If you are in love, use these quotes to express your love feelings. Because love is the most important thing.If you can not find the right words to express your love emotions then this is an application for you.- Messages appear randomly, discover all of them !!!- More than 500 hundreds of love messages- Totally FREE- Cool App, with a nice interface- You NEED this app for Valentine's Day !!!- Send the messages via bluetooth, email, facebook, sms or whatsapp- Different backgroundsTry it out, it's FREE. And  have a happy Valentine's Day.
